text: Amanda Byneshas her mind set on success. The 31-year-old star, who famously retreated from the spotlight after a series of legal problems and personal setbacks, has remerged in the new year, first via social media with a snap of her with friends out to dinner shared on Twitter. Then, she was spotted on her way to the... read full story
title: E! NEWS EXCLUSIVE: Behind the Scenes of Amanda Bynes' Quiet Life—and What Her Main Goal Is Today

meta_data.description: Amanda Byneshas her mind set on success. The 31-year-old star, who famously retreated from the spotlight after a series of legal problems and personal setbacks, has remerged in the new year, first via social media with a snap of her with friends out to dinner shared on Twitter.
